name: My Arena Stories
description:
Finding yourself in a cell, awaiting to be the people's entertainment while you fight for your life, you long for your family. As the arena opponents get tougher, so must you. Is escape possible?

Let the story take you in as you fight your way back to your family with your fully custom character and class of your choice.

Made in RPG MAKER MV.  Feel free to enjoy the game for free! ALL donations are very much appreciated and are going to my next project.  This is an old project from years ago I worked on and decided to pick up and finish.

Next Project is a Psychological Horror / Genre mashup... 

3-4 hours Gameplay.
